Has there been any research on implementing a wheel strategy in the SPY for zero DTE options over the past 10-20 years? Given the upward trend, this strategy may outperform the market returns. Zero DTE options are unique as the premium received is fixed for the day, limiting adjustments.
We have not researched a wheel strategy for zero days as we do not believe it is an appropriate strategy. It is possible to implement, but not recommended.
